name: INCreateTaskListIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for creating task lists.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveTitle(for: INCreateTaskListIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the title of the task list.

items.name: func resolveTaskTitles(for: INCreateTaskListIntent, with: ([INSpeakableStringResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the tasks in a task list.

items.name: func resolveGroupName(for: INCreateTaskListIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the intended group for the task list.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INCreateTaskListIntent, completion: (INCreateTaskListIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can create the task list.

items.name: func handle(intent: INCreateTaskListIntent, completion: (INCreateTaskListIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the creation of a task list.
